name: loops
description: Loops is a self-hosted, open-source alternative to customer messaging platforms. It supports email campaigns, workflows, and customer segmentation for full control over user communications.
features: Email Campaigns: Create and send campaigns, Template management, Scheduling. Professional email marketing platform.
Customer Segmentation: Audience targeting, Behavioral segments, Custom filters. Send relevant messages to each group.
Workflow Automation: Trigger-based emails, Drip campaigns, Event-driven messaging. Automate customer communications.
Analytics: Open rates, Click tracking, Campaign performance. Measure email effectiveness.
Contact Management: Import contacts, List management, Subscriber profiles. Organize your audience efficiently.
Template Editor: Drag-and-drop builder, HTML support, Responsive design. Create beautiful emails easily.
API Integration: RESTful API, Webhook support, Third-party connectors. Connect to your existing tools.
Self-Hosted: Full data ownership, Privacy control, No vendor lock-in. Own your customer messaging platform.
